category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 15 (Medical Advisory Group for Review Claims)
contents: Article 15 (Medical Advisory Group for Review Requests) ① The Corporation may establish a medical advisory group for review requests for the evaluation stipulated in Article 97 of the Decree. ② Article 7 of the National Pension Disability Examination Regulations shall apply mutatis mutandis to matters relating to the qualifications and appointment of consulting doctors under paragraph (1), and Article 10 of the same regulations shall apply to matters relating to dismissal. ③ Advice under paragraph (1) cannot be requested from the consulting doctor involved in the disposition in question. ④ If the consulting doctor of the medical advisory group for review request responds to the consultation, consultation allowance may be paid within the budget. [Article title revised on November 26, 2013]
